I never go by these review guides....to me it is by word of mouth or an actual experience. Sounds like Zagat just wants to make more $$$ North of the Border.

True...so do you think Montrealers or other Canadians vsiting the city would buy Zagats? I am no expert but since I live in close proximity to a major resto city (NYC) I have always gone by the recommendations of friends who dine out frequently or I do the adventurous thing and try it myself.
PS...Of course we also have a bedbug epidemic so maybe they should produce a guide to bugfree hotels :)
